item.title: Tea With Friends
item.description:
Tea With Friends

Tea With Friends explores the association between taste and memory as famously described by Marcel Proust. One evening, a taste of tea enveloped me in a memory from early childhood, evoking the recollection of my fondness for hosting teddy bear tea parties. Created for the Weekend Challenge: vimeo.com/groups/weekendchallenge

item.title: Moonchaser
item.description:
Moonchaser

This film is for portfolio use only.

item.title: Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.1of 5
item.description:
Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.1of 5

The latest in a long line of selfless acts, ground breaking personality researcher Dr. Walter Bullard spearheads an awareness campaign in an effort to raise funds for Bully Displacement Disorder.

item.title: Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.2 of 5
item.description:
Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.2 of 5

Dr. Walter Bullard provides a historical example of bullying's many advantages.

item.title: Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.3 of 5
item.description:
Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.3 of 5

Dr. Walter Bullard provides some dos and don'ts for home care.

item.title: Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep. 4 of 5
item.description:
Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep. 4 of 5

Dr. Walter Bullard explains Bullying's strong ties to tradition.

item.description:
Bullying for a Brighter Tomorrow Ep.5 of 5

item.title: King Simon
item.description:
King Simon

This film is for portfolio use only. Nominated for Best Sound at Savannah College of Art and Design's SCADemy awards. I served as Sound Supervisor and Foley and ADR mixer on the project.

item.title: The Revolving Fund
item.description:
The Revolving Fund

This video was produced by the National Trust for Historic Preservation and the 1772 Foundation. Created by the Savannah College of Art and Design it is a piece of enhanced content for the Fall 2014 issue of Forum Journal "Get Real about Real Estate."
